    • Snake

      public Snake​(int Length, int Size, char[] dir, int StepSize)
      Parameters:
      Length - - Body Length of the Snake
      Size - - Size of array containing the body
      dir - - reference to the direction that's taken from the GamePanel's InputAdapted class
      StepSize - - the amount the snake is to move every frame
